name: Glitch Battlegrounds
description:
A simple Plant vs Zombies clone I made following a series of tutorials in the Udemy Unity 2D course.

Instructions
Select a defense unit on the selection panel at the bottom of the screen and click anywhere on the garden where there is space to place it.

You will want to place star collectors at the beginning to increase the numbers of stars you get per second in order to place down more defenses in the long run. Only place defenders on rows that have attackers on them because not all rows at the start of the game are occupied by attackers.

*Tip: If you are struggling to complete a level, go back to the main menu, click on options, and decrease the difficulty by adjusting the slider.

Skills

  • C# programming
  • Sprite slicing and animation
  • Level design with gradual difficulty increase
  • Configurable difficulty and sound levels in options menu
